main event: A UFO was reported in Oil City, Pennsylvania on March 11, 1967, by an eyewitness who described it as a round, white object that appeared and disappeared periodically.
interesting points: The object was described as very bright and moving quickly to the northeast., The observer was a person identified as a Presburn at Venango General Hospital., Eyewitness reported seeing the object clearly at 8:15 p.m., No sound was associated with the object., Similar sightings were recorded around the same period in the Pittsburgh area.
